text: Steven Jon Hambleton (born 14 January 1961) is a Brisbane, Australia GP and former federal president of the Australian Medical Association. ==Early life== ===Education=== Steve Hambleton attended St Joseph's College, Gregory Terrace from 1969 to 1978. Hambleton studied a Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery at the University of Queensland from 1979 to 1984. ==Professional career== ===Australian Medical Association Federal Presidency=== Hambleton served as president of the Australian Medical Association for three years from his unopposed election in June 2011 to May 2014. ===AMAQ Foundation=== Hambleton is the Foundation President of the AMAQ Foundation, the charity arm of the AMAQ. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1961 births Category:Australian general practitioners Category:Presidents of the Australian Medical Association
title: Steve Hambleton
